betterroofs.tileConfig.showInFog.name: Reveals Fog of War
betterroofs.tileConfig.showInFog.hint: When a token has vision of this tile, the tile will be visible through Fog of War. Does not work with Lights.
betterroofs.tileConfig.occlusionLinkIdHi: Can be any text. When a tile with 'Occlusion Link Source?' is occluded (has a token under it) all tiles with the same 'Occlusion Link Id' will be occluded as well. Example usage: linking roofs together.
